gift_source:
::MC1::
What does detection mean in computer vision?
{
= Locating objects or regions of interest
~ Assigning class labels
~ Removing noise
~ Histogram equalization
}
title: MC1
question: What does detection mean in computer vision?

choices.text: Locating objects or regions of interest

gift_source:
::MC2::
What does category recognition mean?
{
= Assigning class labels to detected objects
~ Locating regions only
~ Reducing dimensionality
~ Compressing images
}
title: MC2
question: What does category recognition mean?

choices.text: Assigning class labels to detected objects

~ Sorting documents

question: Which is an example of detection?
